Member Function Documentation

+ (NSString *) inMobiSDKVersion  

Returns the version of the current inMobi SDK.

- (void) loadNewAd  

Reload an existing InMobiAdView with a new ad. If an ad not loaded successfully, this call fails silently and the old ad remains onscreen. This method should only be called from a run loop in default run loop mode. To preserve the user experience, we recommend loading new ads no more frequently than once per minute.

- (void) setAdUnit: (int)  adUnit  

Set adUnit for InMobiAdView. See supported banner sizes as mentioned above.

- (void) setDelegate: (id<InMobiAdDelegate>)  delegate  

Setter for InMobiAdView's delegate. Set the delegate to nil, if you do not want to receive notifications from

- (void) setRequestParameter: (NSString *)  param
forKey: (NSString *)  key 

Optional: Use this method to assign a custom reference tag at the time of making an Ad Request to the InMobi Ad Server.

+ (InMobiAdView *) startInmobiAdEngineAttachedDelegate: (id<InMobiAdDelegate>)  delegate  

Equivalent to [InMobiAdView requestAdOfSize:INMOBI_AD_UNIT_320x48 withDelegate:delegate];

Deprecated:
This method is deprecated in version 1.3.0 & above. Use requestAdUnit:withDelegate: instead.
